summary:
- **Substantial Holder Ceased**: Martyn McCathie ceased to be a substantial holder of Yowie Group Ltd (YOW) on **27 June 2025**.  
- **Reason**: Technical association with Keybridge Capital (holder of 214.1M YOW shares) ended after McCathie was appointed as a Yowie director at the 27 June 2025 general meeting.  
- **Prior Disclosure**: Last substantial holding notice was dated **19 May 2025** (lodged 20 May 2025).  

*No material trading or capital markets impact identified beyond the change in substantial holding status.*
